about_the_game:
From the twisted mind of TROMA Shorts Creator Emil Levin comes a new old-school first-person shooter paying homage to genre classics such as Blood, Duke Nukem 3D and Rise of the Triad.



REVEREND puts you in the boots of a disillusioned former reverend, tasked with fighting back against the evil lurking beneath the church he once called home. Battle against Eldritch and Demonic beasts that would cripple the average mind to witness.



Visit varied nightmarish locations ranging from crematoriums to flesh-pits. Use powerful and distinctive weaponry, including forbidden fruit which explode upon contact with the horrors surrounding you. Hunt for keys and scavenge for resources to keep you alive and get you closer to your goal. Also, keep an eye out for secrets, as easter eggs, resources and secret pathways make exploration a strong recommendation.



GRISLY ENVIRONMENTS
UNHOLY ARSENAL
GRUESOME BOSS FIGHTS
SATISTYING SECRETS
GORE, SWEET GORE
CLASSIC 90s FPS GAMEPLAY
HIDEOUS ENEMIES

Be sure to check out the old-school manual in your Steam Library Hub! Questions will be answered... and raised.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes content that deals with mature topics and may not be appropriate for all audiences.
